prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

## ATMOSPHERE & MOOD
LIGHTING: Bright natural daylight - warm golden tones, soft shadows, clear visibility

## VISUAL CONTINUITY (from previous panel)
This panel continues from the previous panel.

MATCH FROM PREVIOUS PANEL:
- Art style, line weight, coloring technique
- Color palette and lighting direction
- Background style and detail level
- Props/objects: same shape, color, design

CREATE NEW:
- Fresh pose and body position for this action
- New camera angle as specified
- End of chapter cliffhanger shot.

## COMPOSITION
- Shot: wide establishing shot showing full environment and characters
- Angle: high angle looking down, shows vulnerability or overview
- Location: The Whispering Woods (A forest where the flora reacts to emotions. Beautiful but disorienting.) - Visual elements: Lighting: Bioluminescent purple and blue glow from plants, Object: Trees with bark patterns that look like faces, Atmosphere: Ethereal and slightly ominous, Color Palette: Cool purples, teals, and neon pinks
## CHARACTERS (PRIORITY PER CHARACTER)
Each character below has a specific priority instruction based on whether they appeared in the previous panel.
- If a character WAS in previous panel: match their appearance from previous panel exactly
- If a character was NOT in previous panel: match their CHARACTER REFERENCE SHEET exactly (highest priority)
- Text descriptions are supplementary only

Only change: expression, pose, camera angle as specified below.

**Lily** (Priority: CHARACTER REFERENCE SHEET (highest - not in previous panel))
  Physical: Petite, messy rose-gold hair tied in a loose side braid. Large, expressive teal eyes behind round, slightly crooked glasses. Always has ink smudges on her cheek.
  - Hair: Rose-gold, messy side braid with loose strands
  - Face: Round slightly crooked glasses, ink smudges on cheek
  - Outfit: Oversized navy blue wizard robe with gold constellation patches
  - Accessory: A battered wooden staff held together with duct tape
  - Footwear: Mismatched brown leather boots
  - Build: Short, constantly tripping or hunched over books
  Expression: neutral
  Position: left of frame
**Ember (formerly Ignis)** (Priority: PREVIOUS PANEL (match exactly))
  Physical: A morbidly obese orange tabby cat. His eyes are vertical dragon slits (glowing gold).
  - Body: Fat orange tabby cat
  - Distinctive Feature: Tiny, useless membranous dragon wings on his back
  - Accessory: A red velvet collar with a heavy gold coin pendant
  - Expression: Perpetually unimpressed / half-lidded eyes
  - Movement: Floats slightly when too lazy to walk
  Expression: neutral
  Position: center of frame
**Marcus** (Priority: CHARACTER REFERENCE SHEET (highest - not in previous panel))
  Physical: Tall, broad-shouldered, classic 'hero' jawline. Blonde hair styled perfectly.
  - Hair: Spiky blonde hair, always shiny
  - Outfit: Polished silver chest plate over a red tunic
  - Accessory: A ridiculously long red cape that he constantly trips over
  - Weapon: An oversized broadsword he struggles to unsheathe
  - Build: Muscular but stiff posture
  Expression: neutral
  Position: right of frame

## ACTION & EMOTION
The three characters stand small at the edge of the dark path, looking into the deep, scary woods where the map vanished.

## VISUAL EFFECTS (if appropriate)
- Motion lines for movement
- Speed lines for action
- Sparkles/glow for magical/emotional moments
- Dramatic lighting for tension

## TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- FULL BLEED composition (art to all edges, NO white borders)
- NO text, speech bubbles, or sound effects in image
- Clean professional linework
- Expressive faces with clear emotions
- Dynamic poses with weight and balance
- Rich background detail that supports the mood

panel_data.action: The three characters stand small at the edge of the dark path, looking into the deep, scary woods where the map vanished.
